metadata.title: CVE-2024-22860 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg before n6.1, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via the jpegxl_anim_read_packetcomponent in the JPEG XL Animation decoder.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
